channel.title: Comments on: Fresh Soy Face Cleanser

item.title: By: Sarah Cosper
item.dc:creator: Sarah Cosper
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/fresh-soy-face-cleanser/#comment-72">Missy</a>.
Yep! If you're washing your face, you should be moisturizing. Before bed is a good time for treatments, serums, and what have you.You can use something without an SPF though, for obvious reasons.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Missy.

Yep! If you’re washing your face, you should be moisturizing. Before bed is a good time for treatments, serums, and what have you.You can use something without an SPF though, for obvious reasons.

item.title: By: Missy
item.dc:creator: Missy
item.description:
Your skin always looks gorgeous. I've never even seen a pore on your face.
Also, should I be moisturizing at night before bed?
item.content:encoded:
Your skin always looks gorgeous. I’ve never even seen a pore on your face.

Also, should I be moisturizing at night before bed?
